items.title: Hasbro is overhauling Monopoly, introducing expansions and swapping out a longstanding token
Millions will get higher Social Security benefits after Biden signs ‘fairness’ bill
items.description: "Americans who have worked hard all their lives to earn an honest living should be able to retire with economic security and dignity," Biden said.

items.title: Global ad giant WPP issues sweeping RTO mandate for its 114,000 staff, calling them back to office 4 days a week
items.description: "I believe that we do our best work when we are together in person," CEO Mark Read wrote in the memo viewed by Fortune.

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg takes a cue from Elon Musk: Facebook and Instagram will ditch fact-checking and instead rely on community notes
items.description: The Meta CEO announced changes to content moderation just in time for a familiar incoming presidential administration.

items.title: McDonald’s just gave the value menu its biggest shakeup in years
